title: Gazebo 9 looks for OpenCV 2.4 core .so and quits

content.raw:
recreate by:

1. install full ros kinetic
2. remove gazebo7
3. install  gazebo9
4. build opencv 3.3.1
5. run gazebo
6. issue recreates.

workaround : 
paste
libopencv_core.so.2.4
libopencv_core.so.2.4.9
libopencv_imgproc.so.2.4
libopencv_imgproc.so.2.4.9
to 
/opt/ros/kinetic/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/
